name: pumpkin.GUTS
description:
I made this game in 7 hours...

It's 2am...

I wanna go to sleep...

BUT! I have to share my game with you anyways, so...

pumpkin.Guts is a simple shooter made in around 7 hours (Basically that means it's pretty bad, well, some of the art is not rushed so it looks decent) where enemies constantly fly at you as you are Trick or Treating. You only have one life before it restarts, so be careful!

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

LMB to shoot

Walk into the houses to gain candy

DO NOT CLICK THE SPACEBAR THREE TIMES OR YOU WILL BE KILLED BY THE GODS!!! (Imma sleep now)
